Name: Emod "Tweaker" Stabilizer2
Description:
Manufacturer: ArmaMod
Type: Energy Stabilizer
Attachment Point: Barrel
Size: 2

Damage: +12.5%
Recoil Stability: +15%
Recoil Kick: +40%
Spread: +25%
Ammo Cost Per Shot: +50%

Reduce energy weapon recoil with the Emod Stabilizer2. ArmaMod designed the attachment to improve both horizontal and vertical recoil to ensure a more precise shot. This "Tweaker" version has been unofficially modified to do more damage.
